Unlimited Local/STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, local & national tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- 1 GB/Day 2G/3G/4G data -- Customers newly upgrading to 4G Handset will be eligible to get additional data only after 48 hours of handset upgrade. Additional data can be used on for 4G handset users & 1GB 2G/3G/4G data for non 4G handset users -- Rs.17.4 Talktime (Extra Talktime Offer through Idea Website and My Idea App only) -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
